name: ÔMIZEL
description:
Credits: 

  • Adrien Dittrick
  • Romain Chantraine
  • Alexandre François
  • Sabrina Tailhandier (Sa-chan)
  • Jennifer Tailhandier (Sen)

What is this?

Made for the 2019 Global Game Jam, ÔMIZEL is a 2-player cooperative game about managing house chores. You must make sure that both players take part equally in order to avoid the mental burden which comes with unfair housework separation.

Controls:

  • Player 1: WASD
  • Player 2: arrow keys
  • F4: fullscreen (windows only)
  • Escape: quit game (windows only)
